Name: Hentai energy: Halloween
About the game: Hentai energy: Halloween is a casual comic book puzzle game. The comic book was painted by the master of his business LeArtNi. It tells the story of a young witch who performed a magical ritual. Also by numerous requests in the game appeared 'administrator mode'. Administrator mode Press the F button while at the art or puzzle level and you will immediately open the entire block of five puzzles and get the corresponding achievements. There's a game waiting for you Interesting puzzles A real hentai from LeArtNi Nice music from Trauerbaum Beautiful achievements Powered by Clickteam Fusion 2.5
